data.enText: the state of feeling bored; the quality of being very boring
I started to eat too much out of sheer boredom.
data.chText: 由于实在闲极无聊，我开始无节制地大吃起来。

data.enText: Television helps to relieve the boredom of the long winter evenings.
data.chText: 电视有助于打发漫长无聊的冬夜。

tr: the feeling of being bored by something tedious

example.ex: He had given up attending lectures out of sheer boredom...
example.tran: 他不再去听那些讲座完全是出于厌倦。

example.ex: They often find they begin to chat to relieve the boredom of the flight.
example.tran: 他们发现自己常常是为了打发飞行途中的无聊才开始聊天。

value.def: Boredom is the state of being bored.
